bug.author: ebadi
bug.summary: Randomized vehicle license plates not working
bug.description:
The randomized license plate feature is not working. According to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/blob/dev/CHANGELOG.md#carla-041>CARLA 0.4.1 Changelog</denchmark-link> , the "randomized vehicle license plates" is supported since 0.4.1. The documentation for <denchmark-link:https://carla.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tuto_A_vehicle_modelling/>vehicle modeling</denchmark-link> also mentions license plate texture and there is a blueprint (BaseVehiclePawn > License Plate) defined for license plates. There are license plate textures assets accessible from however I cannot find any documentation that explains how the default license plate can be changed. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1111940/95719554-48ab7a00-0c70-11eb-8eb3-f2a4f531c0f4.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1111940/95730552-b1015800-0c7e-11eb-8885-f1db5608a8d4.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ebadi>@ebadi</denchmark-link> , I will look into it. I'll let you know if I find something.

It is very much appreciated <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Madecu>@Madecu</denchmark-link> . I don't have much experience in unreal engine and 3D modelling but I would be glad to contribute as much as I can, if pointers/references are provided.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ebadi>@ebadi</denchmark-link> , I found that we had had this feature disabled for a while. If you want to enable it, you just need to do the next two steps: First, connect the LicensePlate function to the EventGraph <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54811869/96129199-a3560780-0ef6-11eb-8c62-2dbf660cf2ed.png></denchmark-link>
Second, you need to delete a node that is no longer functioning and replaced it with "Random Integer" <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54811869/96129434-e7490c80-0ef6-11eb-8881-9e02552a9c24.png></denchmark-link>
Bonus track. If you want to change the player's license plate too, connect the "True" output to this node: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54811869/96129787-5b83b000-0ef7-11eb-95a7-e4b56ce8b759.png></denchmark-link>
I hope this helps you

Thank you. I tried it and it works now. :) I think there are other issues like some license plates keeping their default values. I close this issue and try to look deeper later. If it was relevant to this issue, I reopen this, otherwise I report a new issue and tag you there. Thank you so much <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Madecu>@Madecu</denchmark-link> .
